alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 18 at 10:01AM CST until January 18 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 1001 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Feenyville, or 10 miles northwest of Star City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Cottondale... Linwood... Richardson... Madding... Tarry... Cornerstone... Tamo... Pinebergen... Moscow... Ladd... Glenlake... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
